sourcesContent:
<template>
    <a-modal title="修改角色" :visible="value" @cancel="bindClickCancel" @ok="bindClickSubmit" cancelText="取消" okText="提交">
        <a-form :form="form">
            <a-form-item label="角色名称" v-bind="formItemLayout">
                <a-input placeholder="请输入" v-decorator="[
                    'roleName',
                    {
                        initialValue: localRole.roleName,
                        rules: [
                            {required: true, message: '角色名称不能为空'}
                        ],
                        validateTrigger: ['blur']
                    }
                ]"/>
            </a-form-item>
            <a-form-item label="角色描述" v-bind="formItemLayout">
                <a-textarea placeholder="请输入" :rows="4" v-decorator="[
                    'roleDescription',
                    {initialValue: localRole.roleDescription}
                ]"/>
            </a-form-item>
            <a-form-item label="角色状态" v-bind="formItemLayout">
                <a-switch v-model="localRole.roleStatus"/>
            </a-form-item>
        </a-form>
    </a-modal>
</template>

<script>
    import {RoleApi} from '@/api';
    import {FormMixin} from '@/mixins';

    export default {
        name: "RoleModify",
        mixins: [FormMixin],
        props: {
            value: {
                type: Boolean,
                default: false
            },
            role: {
                type: Object,
                default() {
                    return {}
                }
            }
        },
        data() {
            return {
                localRole: {}
            }
        },
        methods: {
            modifyRole(role) {
                RoleApi.modify(role).then(() => {
                    this.bindClickCancel();
                    this.$emit("success");
                });
            },
            bindClickSubmit() {
                this.form.validateFields((err, values) => {
                    if (!err) {
                        values = Object.assign(this.localRole, values);
                        this.modifyRole(values);
                    }
                });
            },
            bindClickCancel() {
                this.form.resetFields();
                this.$emit("input", false);
            }
        },
        watch: {
            role(value) {
                this.localRole = this.$_.cloneDeep(value);
            }
        }
    }
</script>
